author: Amit Bhattacharya
title: First in 12 weeks, Covid deaths in India start to dip
description: India's painfully high death count in the second wave of the Covid pandemic is finally coming down. In the week ended Sunday, nationwide fatalities dipped by 17%, the first decline in 12 weeks, even as the daily death toll dropped below 3,000 after 34 days.
